node.html: 1X is an AI and robotics company, with roots in Norway and Silicon Valley, dedicated to building fully autonomous humanoid robots that live and learn among us.

The Biomimetic Robotics & Artificial Intelligence Lab, or BRAIL, led by Dr. Shyamanta M. Hazarika, is a research laboratory at the Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati, specializing in the development of neuroprostheses and intelligent assistive devices for robotic neurorehabilitation.

Invention Factory is a summer program where students work in teams of two to research prior art, build working prototypes, and conceive an invention, with each team filing a provisional patent application at the program's conclusion.
